A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I went in with extremely high hopes and as an avid star wars fan for years; I was disappointed. I didn't realize I was paying for 150 minutes of dialogue that changed the entire dynamic of luke and pointless subplots to prepare for a new movie. I will say however that with how they ended the movie\, I believe that the next movie will be great because of the new possible creative environment. They set it up to remove the old and move on to a whole new franchise. But once again\, DID NOT enjoy this specific movie.
